m_szDocTitle: 100% Electric Vehicle & Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle Sales Have Record Month! | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 100% Electric Vehicle & Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle Sales Have Record Month! Originally published on EV Obsession . As you can see in the table above, 100% electric cars, plug-in hybrid electric cars (PHEVs), and conventional hybrid electric cars continue to do better and better. 100% electrics were up 457.48% in August 2013 compared to August 2012. And they were up 515.51% January through August 2013 compared toÂ January through August 2012. PHEVs are also up considerably, as are conventional hybrids . The increases for each of the above (compared to 2012) are quite similar to the increase
